services.title: Why Choose
services.subtitle: Empower your team and customers with powerful rewards and incentive programs.
services.item1.title: Analytics Dashboard
services.item1.description: Track performance metrics and engagement in real-time.
services.item2.title: Team Management
services.item2.description: Easily manage participants and team structures.
services.item3.title: Goal Tracking
services.item3.description: Set and monitor objectives with precision.
services.item4.title: Instant Rewards
services.item4.description: Deliver rewards automatically when goals are achieved.
features.title: Powerful Features for Modern Teams
features.subtitle: Everything you need to run successful incentive programs.
features.rewards.title: Smart Rewards
features.rewards.benefit1: Configure automatic reward triggers based on performance
features.rewards.benefit2: Choose from digital gift cards, points, or custom rewards
features.rewards.benefit3: Track reward redemption and engagement analytics
features.analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
features.analytics.benefit1: Real-time dashboards with key performance metrics
features.analytics.benefit2: Export reports and share with stakeholders
features.analytics.benefit3: Predictive analytics to optimize your programs
features.gamification.title: Gamification
features.gamification.benefit1: Leaderboards and rankings to drive friendly competition
features.gamification.benefit2: Badges and achievements for milestone recognition
features.security.title: Enterprise Security
features.security.benefit3: Role-based access controls and audit logs
features.challenges.info: Need to boost sales? Discover the incredible animation possibilities with RewardzAi® and launch in a few clicks your social network to motivate and reward your sales forces, direct and indirect, or your distribution network, across more than 500 performance criteria.
features.loyalty.info: Need to increase your customer value? RewardzAi® is a web/mobile social network that enables you to increase tenfold your brand loyalty, trigger impulse purchases, upsell more, and reward every day every action taken by your clients.
features.loyalty.sponsorship.info: Need to generate leads? What better way to create your social network, to recommend your brand, your products or your events? With RewardzAi®, get every connection become an ambassador of your commercial endeavor, by launching in a few clicks viral reward programs with maximum efficiency.
pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs. All plans include a 14-day free trial.

subscription.title: Your plan
whyChooseUs.everyone.info: A brand means nothing without you. All your brands in one place, a cool interface, you do stuff, you get cash, you buy whatever you want. No more old-fashioned gifts, no more poorly rewarding programs. {link}
whyChooseUs.brands.info: Time to social up & engage with your communities. Don't worry about complexity. Launch a specific program in ten minutes. Monitor it in one screen. Or just ask your agency / community manager. {link}
whyChooseUs.agencies.info: Save on dev, free up time to engage top-tier communities from your clients' brands. Collaborate with motivated people and get paid for actual results (sales, revenue, word of mouth...). Test our solution and get your monthly plan to {link}
howItWorks.step1.info: Choose the type of rewards program, its design, its audience, its goals. That's it. Ten minutes only.
howItWorks.step2.info: Manage everything from your wall: your rewards program is dressed as an augmented social network, with all the emailing, CRM and data catching (GDPR compliant) features you need.
howItWorks.step3.info: Build on your success, duplicate a program and deploy it to a new community. You can now test new approaches, you have access to unlimited possibilities, thanks to our relational marketing solution.
